item.title: Comparing SIMSOLID with a FEA Benchmark
item.description:
Comparing SIMSOLID with a FEA Benchmark

In order to try out SIMSOLID, I wanted to compare it to a study previously done using traditional FEA. The model selected was a welded tube joint. This is typical of joints commonly found in industry and from past experience I have found that conventional FEA codes have a difficult time achieving accurate results at stress concentration points, such as at the intersection of the two tube sections in this model.

item.title: VECTARY | The Ultimate Online 3D Tool
item.description:
VECTARY | The Ultimate Online 3D Tool

VECTARY is an online 3D design tool providing easy ways to create complex shapes. Use your browser to enter the world of 3D modeling.

item.title: Shape Prototype: IoT startups, product design and misconceptions about manufacturing
item.description:
Shape Prototype: IoT startups, product design and misconceptions about manufacturing

Recently founded manufacturer Shape Prototype is quickly gaining popularity both in Asia and in the West. What differentiates them from many well established counterparts is their focus on working with hardware startups. "We believe communication is the key", says Amanda Hsu, co-founder.

item.title: 25 Big Tech Predictions For 2016!
item.description:
25 Big Tech Predictions For 2016!

In 2015, roughly 35%-40% of new cars shipped in the US were connected to the internet, far surpassing our 23% estimate from the beginning of the year. We expect this strong growth to continue through 2016, and estimate that twothirds of new cars shipped in the US will be connected to the internet.

item.title: Taking Your Product from Concept to Reality > ENGINEERING.com
item.description:
Taking Your Product from Concept to Reality > ENGINEERING.com

Taking a product from concept to reality is an intricate, expensive and time-consuming process. It's not easy and there is a high degree of risk involved. Engineering is only part of the process of successfully bringing a new product to market, and prototype production is only part of the larger engineering process.

item.description:

Creative Mechanisms designs and develops original prototypes using Solidworks Computer Aided Design (CAD) software.

item.title: Is Your Data Safe? Fintech Security: Challenges and Solutions | Centric Digital
item.description:
Is Your Data Safe? Fintech Security: Challenges and Solutions | Centric Digital

The financial services industries are a major target for cyber crimes-can companies keep data safe with the current fintech security measures? In 2015, three men were charged as co-conspirators in a theft that is considered one of the largest in the history of U.S.

item.title: Can we trust new mobility systems?
item.description:
Can we trust new mobility systems?

At CES 2016 last week, automotive was once again a large focus not only for NXP, but for the entire conference. Each year, the presence of cars and automotive-related technologies grows at an incredible rate. So much so that some (at least in our own automotive teams) call CES the "car electronics show."
